https://book.hacktricks.wiki/en/network-services-pentesting/ipsec-ike-vpn-pentesting.html?highlight=ike#bruteforcing-id-with-ike-scan

cat ips.txt | while read ip; do
  echo "== Resultado para $ip ==" >> resultado.txt
  ike-scan "$ip" >> resultado.txt
  echo "" >> resultado.txt
done

cat resultado.txt |grep '0 returned hanshake; 1 returned notify'

cat resultado.txt |grep '1 returned hanshake; 0 returned notify'

while read line; do (echo "Found ID: $line" && sudo ike-scan -M -A -n $line <IP>) | grep -B14 "1 returned handshake" | grep "Found ID:"; done < vpnIds.txt
